entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Halton Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 03:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -2.3°C
Wind: E 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain mixed with snow beginning early in the morning then changing to rain showers near noon. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending in the evening then cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
